data.comment: Recife PE kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 1, Willian Farias gets his shot on target but fails to score for Recife PE.
Elton of Recife PE is pulled up for offside.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards Recife PE a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a Recife PE throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
German Cano (Vasco da Gama) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Gabriel Pec (Vasco da Gama) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 6, Free kick Recife PE.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
Recife PE needs to be cautious. Vasco da Gama have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 9, Goal! Fellipe Bastos gives Vasco da Gama a 1-0 lead in Rio de Janeiro.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Recife PE have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 12, Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Vasco da Gama.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 16, Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
In the minute 17, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Recife PE push forward at São Januario and Adryelson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Vasco da Gama defence.
In the minute 20, Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Recife PE's Marquinhos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Vasco da Gama defender.
In the minute 22, Recife PE to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Patric for Recife PE is whistled offside.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 25, Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards the away team a throw-in.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 27, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 29, Willian Farias is booked for the away team.
German Cano (Vasco da Gama) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Vasco da Gama push upfield but Rodolpho Toski Marques quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Fellipe Bastos.
In the minute 35, Vasco da Gama's Gabriel Pec is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in high up the field for Vasco da Gama in Rio de Janeiro.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Recife PE.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Throw-in for Recife PE close to the penalty box.
In the minute 39, Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Can Vasco da Gama capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Recife PE's half?
In the minute 40, Free kick Recife PE.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Vasco da Gama.
In Rio de Janeiro Recife PE attack through Patric. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 42, Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 44, Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a throw-in for Recife PE, close to Vasco da Gama's area.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 45, Free kick Recife PE.
Recife PE's Marquinhos breaks free at São Januario. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at São Januario.
Vasco da Gama kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 46, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Lucas Venuto is replacing Rafael for the away team.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a Recife PE throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
In the minute 47, Recife PE have a dangerous throw-in.
Vasco da Gama pushes forward through Martin Benitez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 50, Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Can Vasco da Gama capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Recife PE's half?
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 52, Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vasco da Gama's German Cano gets in a shot on goal at São Januario. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Cayo Tenorio is replacing Yago Pikachu for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
In the minute 57, Free kick Recife PE.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Rodolpho Toski Marques waits before resuming play because Fernando Miguel for Vasco da Gama is still down.
Fernando Miguel is back on his feet again.
In the minute 64, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Free kick Recife PE.
Bruninho is on a sub for Betinho for Recife PE.
In Rio de Janeiro Recife PE drive forward through Bruninho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 66, Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
Recife PE surge into the attack at São Januario but Iago Maidana’s header is off-target.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Marquinhos (Recife PE) has received a first yellow card.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 69, Talles Magno for Vasco da Gama drives towards goal at São Januario. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Recife PE drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 70, Andrey for Vasco da Gama has been booked by Rodolpho Toski Marques and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 71, Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team replace Marquinhos with Ronaldo Henrique Silva.
Daniel Paulista (Recife PE) is making a fourth substitution, with Hernane Brocador replacing Elton.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Vasco da Gama make their second substitution with Bruno Gomes replacing Fellipe Bastos.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Recife PE.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Vasco da Gama make their third substitution with Guilherme Parede replacing Martin Benitez.
In the minute 76, Ramon Menezes is making the team's fourth substitution at São Januario with Marcos Junior replacing Talles Magno.
The home team have replaced Gabriel Pec with Lucas Santos. This is the fifth substitution made today by Ramon Menezes.
In Rio de Janeiro, Recife PE push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 77, Vasco da Gama are coming forward and Cayo Tenorio gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 79, Hernane Brocador (Recife PE) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Recife PE.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Recife PE close to the penalty box.
Jonathan Gomez (Recife PE) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Vasco da Gama.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bruninho (Recife PE) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 84, Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
Guilherme Parede for Vasco da Gama drives towards goal at São Januario. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Recife PE's Adryelson fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
Vasco da Gama drive upfield and German Cano gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a Recife PE throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
Lucas Venuto returns to the field for Recife PE after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Free kick Recife PE.
Recife PE's Jonathan Gomez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
At São Januario the fourth official shows that 8 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Jonathan Gomez for Recife PE gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Full-time! The final score is 2-0.
Lucas Venuto is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Recife PE are down to 10 men after Ronaldo Henrique Silva has been shown a red card.
